snippet.title: Introvert: A Teenager Simulator - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In Introvert: A Teenager Simulator, one of the new guys in school tells you he’s going to shoot up the school if he doesn’t make friends in 5 days. Discover the decisions, people, situations you will encounter while playing with the other new guy in school trying to make friends of your own and living your own life.

This game talks about serious issues such as bullying and suicidal thoughts in a new and different way that will hopefully be interpreted better by the new generation.
​
This project is also personal to me. It is a small universe I created to make my zone-out thoughts and stories a reality. I made this game cause I was sad so it took a while to be finished, cause you know… It’s hard to work on something when you’re sad.
